phrases: I heard you were taking the day off from work because you were busy with the track team...
You want me to deal with this??
Might you two be out on a date?
And what are you up to here?
We are doing a photo shoot.
Right now I am on break.
You can just call me Ayase.
We are in a bit of a hurry right now...
You are kind of quiet, and you look stressed...
Y-Yeah, I am a bit under the weather.
How about I have someone drive you back?
You know, I have been wondering, but do you know those people behind you?
If we do not hurry, we will miss the 5pm anime.
I do not know those weirdos.
Hey, was something going on today?
I am not sure myself, but they sell doujinshi and stuff...
Sorry, we will catch you another time!
Why are you running away, Kirino?
Kirino, I am worried about you.
You should know by now, Kirino.
You do not want to talk to me?
And here I thought we were friends.
It seems that I misunderstood things.
I want to help you, Kirino.
Something feels wrong today, and I cannot just let you go...
I can no longer be your friend.
Please do not talk to me at school anymore.
I do not know those weirdos.
I do not think Miss Kiririn was being serious there.
Thanks to you, we managed to work it out somehow.
Sorry for using you like that.
I tried calling Miss Kiririn too, but she did not pick up...
She is already gone to bed.
Miss Kuroneko was also quite worried.
I will get her to apologize to her too.
You need not worry about it.
Do your best at training camp!
Who do you think I am, Mom?
When she uses her tentacles, Reika's back becomes exposed.
It is not like I looked this up for you or anything!
Now you can fight against other players!
I can use my character against other players now.
Something happen to you at school today?
Did Ayase break her promise and tell everyone about your hobby?
Have you made up with her?
If you do not say anything, I cannot help!
I talk to you a little and now you are acting all gross!
And what is wrong with that?
I said I do not care if I am gross!
After all, I am a perverted siscon idiot of a brother that thinks he is got something good going on after he got to know his sister a bit.
I am not letting you leave here till you tell me the whole story.
You have not made up with Ayase, right?
But you acted like nothing happened the day after.
I had training camp, so I could not disappoint anyone.
What is that supposed to mean?
A lot of people wanted to go to camp, and since I was chosen to go, I could not just stay depressed and not work hard.
That was a separate problem, and at the camp I had to focus on doing what I had to do.
So did not you try calling her or something?
What do you think you are doing?
It is not like I can help it.
Is not she your best friend?
Are you really just going to leave things like this?
Stop talking like you know what I am going through!
I cannot stand the way you are just giving up like that!
Normally you would try to fix it any way you could, no matter how unsightly or how low the odds were!
Why are you acting all mature all of a sudden?
Getting a lecture from you after this long really pisses me off!
Sorry, but I am not going to sit and listen.
I am not going to just nod and do what you say, like Neighbor-girl does.
You have never cared about me my whole life, and only now you are trying to act the big brother part?
Of course I cannot leave it like this!
Do not say it like it is so simple!
The life counseling is not over...
Take responsibility for it till the end!
Just say that from the start next time, idiot.
I cannot associate myself with someone with that kind of hobby.
What do you think of it?
Though, the answer's obvious at this point.
Kirino is not that kind of person.
What did you say to Kirino today?
Is not it natural that I would want to make up with her?
Drop that hobby and throw it all away.
Do you know what she said?
That means that hobby is more important to her than me!
I am not trying to defend her hobby, but you do not really understand what kind of hobby it is, do you?
You have decided you hate it without really knowing anything about it.
I have seen it on the news.
Games and anime where people do lewd things to little girls are becoming more and more widespread in Japan.
A famous journalist reported on it.
Are not those the kind of things Kirino has?
So when I find out that my best friend has such a disgusting hobby, is not it natural for me to try to make her stop?
People who play and watch those things will eventually have their minds broken, and lose their humanity.
And there was a man who was influenced by those games to electrocute a girl.
The culprit was one of those so-called otaku would-be-criminals, and he said he was trying to mimic what he saw in a game called Siscalypse.
Those kinds of games and manga should not be allowed to exist!
Anyone who plays them or creates them is a criminal just waiting to come out!
They need to be regulated and controlled!
This is a hobby that Kirino absolutely cannot have!
So I guess she is seriously worried about Kirino...
It is going to be hard to deal with how all these incidents involving otaku really do strengthen her argument.
Hey Dad, can I ask you something?
A middle school girl I am friends with recently saw a big haul of eromanga I got!
You came to me to discuss that, of all things?!
I just want to know something.
So, what did you want to say?
You cannot make up with Kirino because her hobby is indecent, and she will not give it up.
After we talked about that, I looked into a few things.
I have heard about that case.
An associate of mine at the station brought me the information.
And I also know about the journalist that wrote the article.
I just happened to be looking into the incident at the time.
It is not like I looked into it for you.
I will start from my results.
At first, the culprit in the SisCaly incident did say he tried to electrocute a little girl in imitation of a game,
but he withdrew that statement later.
He said that he took out the stun gun because he wanted to get violent on a girl.
It is a pretty sleazy way to go.
The second article was a lot smaller than the first, though.
But then the journalist would have
I apologize for stating something which may have caused a misunderstanding.
I made a mistake in collecting information.
I hope to inform you all of the truth with regards to the incident as the time calls.
They did not say anything about that on TV...
I do not think everything they say is a lie.
But I do not think all the otaku bashing is completely untruthful either.
But as far as this incident goes, I think that journalist may have just misinterpreted some of the information.
And part of the mass media jumped right on it.
There is more of it here.
And there is no evidence that playing games causes people to lose their humanity either.
So could you stop referring to otaku as criminals waiting to happen?
Sure, there might be some bad guys among them, but they are not all bad.
This was a mistake on my part.
I take back what I said.
But it does not change the fact that Kirino's hobby is disgusting.
You might see it that way, but cannot you try to ignore it?
She keeps it to herself because she knows that she cannot let anyone know.
She is kept it to herself and lied to us all.
She just never had to tell you!
And more importantly, because she did not want to lose your friendship!
What do you know about us?
I know Kirino better than anyone!
Give me back my best friend!
Give me back the real Kirino!
This is something I have to do.
I am not listening to a fake Kirino.
I want to talk to the real Kirino!
Beautiful, overflowing with style and fashion sense, ace athlete, honor student,
surrounded by friends, the idol of the entire student body,
loved by the teachers, the star of the track team,
working as a model outside school,
depended on by everyone, loved by everyone
that super-perfect, super-cool, super-cute, super-beautiful Kousaka Kirino?
Ayase, but you do not really understand.
I like the manga that you call indecent!
I really like those eroge you call disgusting!
I never get tired of watching anime with cute girls no matter how many times I watch them!
I get really happy just looking at my character goods!
I can even say I love them!
No matter what anyone says, that is who I am!
So I know you are worried about me, but I will not stop!
I will not throw away this hobby no matter what!
If I stop, I will not be me anymore!
Is it more important than your friends?
Is your hobby more important than me?!
I like you just as much as my eroge!
If I were able to just pick one, I would not have any problems!
But I love both my friends and my eroge!
Things turned out like this because I love them both!
And I do not plan on throwing away either of them.
I am going to make up with you!
And I will not throw away my hobby!
Do you have a problem with that?
I want to make up with you too.
But I cannot accept your hobby.
Did not you just say you would make up with me?
I cannot stand that kind of manga...
You want me to step in now??
What are you trying to do?!
I will beat you to a pulp!
is the symbol of love between me and Kirino!
What kind of crazy talk are you
We in love with each other!
That is why we have been gathering tales of forbidden love!
If I had not found that, I would never have realized my feelings for Kirino.
Our relationship would have been frozen over forever!
Kirino's hobby has repaired the bonds between us that were broken!
We were able to become true siblings through it!
You think we would let anyone deny these feelings?
Kirino, let us make up right now.
This was not the time to be fighting about something as silly as what is filthy or disgusting.
I am so sorry I never realized it.
Get away from her, you freak!
You were the root of all the evil!
Do not ever touch my best friend again!
Your pervertedness has allowed me and Kirino to make up.
But if you do anything indecent to Kirino, I will beat you to death.
He has not done anything you have to worry about.
Are you planning to just keep my computer?
I will bring it to your room later, happy?
I am going to kick your butt.
